name: JUMBOshrimp
tagline: Big Ideas Don't Require Big Agencies.
description: At JUMBOshrimp, we create ideas that drive business for some of the world’s best-known consumer and B2B brands. It’s a rare combination of strategic insight and creative vision that is completely focused on connecting at every touch-point of your buyer’s journey. With us as your marketing partner, you turn first-time lookers into long-term customers.
